title: "Service Activities"
format: html
---

CARD lab members have been leaders and/or active participants in numerous campus organizations, including:
- [Forging Club](https://campuslink.uc.edu/organization/forging)
- [Habitat for Humanity](https://campuslink.uc.edu/organization/habitatuc)
- Society for Women Engineers [Undergraduate Chapter](https://campuslink.uc.edu/organization/society-of-women-engineers) [Graduate Chapter](https://campuslink.uc.edu/organization/graduate-society-of-women-engineers)
- [Pride in Engineering](https://campuslink.uc.edu/organization/pieuc)
- [Materials Advantage](https://campuslink.uc.edu/organization/materialadvantage)
- [Engineers Without Borders](https://campuslink.uc.edu/organization/engineers-without-borders)
- [Nigerian Student Association](https://campuslink.uc.edu/organization/ucnsa)
- [Mechanical and Materials Engineering Graduate Student Association](https://campuslink.uc.edu/organization/mmegsa)
- [National Society of Black Engineers](https://campuslink.uc.edu/organization/national-society-of-black-engineers)

Several students have been Darwin T. Turner scholars.

We have provided [CubeCats](https://campuslink.uc.edu/organization/university-of-cincinnati-cubecats) with support, and volunteered as appraisers for [Ohio Kids for Creativity](https://www.ohdi.org/about/okc/) events annually since 2023.

Prof Payton is the campus advisor for the [UC Forging Club](https://campuslink.uc.edu/organization/forging) and has managed a [Destination Imagination](https://www.destinationimagination.org) team annually since 2021.
